data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 2, Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Kawasaki.
Free kick for Kawasaki in their own half.

Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kawasaki in their own half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Yokohama Marinos.

Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.

Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 15, Yokohama Marinos's Kota Mizunuma has run offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.

Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.

Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Kawasaki throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 23, Kawasaki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Kawasaki.
In the minute 29, Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Kawasaki.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Kawasaki a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 30, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.

Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.

Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick in a good position for Kawasaki!
At Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium, Yohei Takaoka is shown a red card and sent off.
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a first substitution, with Powell Obinna Obi replacing Kota Mizunuma.
In the minute 43, Yasuto Wakizaka of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 44, Can Kawasaki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Kawasaki to check on Takuya Kida, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Takuya Kida returns to the field for Yokohama Marinos after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Kawasaki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama Marinos's half?
Kawasaki pushes forward through Yasuto Wakizaka, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 46, Kawasaki to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Ryota Ohshima is on a sub for Ao Tanaka for Kawasaki.
Kaoru Mitoma is replacing Tatsuya Hasegawa for the home team.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a throw-in for Kawasaki, close to Yokohama Marinos's area.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Kawasaki's Yasuto Wakizaka breaks free at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In the minute 49, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Kawasaki.
At Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium, Jesiel has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 52, In Kawasaki Kawasaki drive forward through Kaoru Mitoma. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal! Kawasaki have got their heads in front thanks to a Kaoru Mitoma strike.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 54, Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Kawasaki are coming forward and Manabu Saito gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Free kick for Kawasaki in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
Kawasaki's Manabu Saito gets in a shot on goal at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama Marinos in Kawasaki.
In Kawasaki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The away team replace Takuya Kida with Jun Amano.
In the minute 59, Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Shinnosuke Hatanaka (Yokohama Marinos) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 61, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Throw-in for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 63, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Kawasaki just outside Yokohama Marinos's area.
Ken Matsubara (Yokohama Marinos) has received a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 65, Kawasaki drive forward but Leandro Damiao is judged offside.
Kawasaki make their third substitution with Yu Kobayashi replacing Leandro Damiao.
Kawasaki make their fourth substitution with Reo Hatate replacing Manabu Saito.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kawasaki are pushing forward but Ryota Ohshima's finish is wide of the goal.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kawasaki have a dangerous throw-in.

Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Shogo Taniguchi's header is off-target for Kawasaki.
In the minute 69, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kawasaki.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Kawasaki's Yu Kobayashi is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 72, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Kawasaki's half.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Kawasaki in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 74, Kawasaki drives forward and Ryota Ohshima gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
Corner awarded to Kawasaki.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Erik of Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Kawasaki at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
In the minute 76, Kawasaki's Reo Hatate gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 77, Free kick Kawasaki.
Marcos Junior is booked for the away team.
At Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium, Kawasaki are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 81, Jung Sung-Ryong for Kawasaki has been booked by Hiroyuki Kimura and receives a first yellow card.
Yokohama Marinos's Theerathon Bunmathan has been booked in Kawasaki.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Marcos Junior.
In the minute 82, Ryo Takano is replacing Theerathon Bunmathan for Yokohama Marinos at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium.
Teruhito Nakagawa (Yokohama Marinos) has replaced the possibly injured Marcos Junior.
The away team replace Erik with Kota Watanabe.
In the minute 83, Kengo Nakamura is replacing Yasuto Wakizaka for the home team.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos needs to be cautious. Kawasaki have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 89, Kyohei Noborizato of Kawasaki smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Kawasaki have been awarded a penalty...
A massive blow for Kawasaki as Yu Kobayashi misses from the spot.
Kawasaki have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Throw-in for Kawasaki close to the penalty box.
That's full-time at Kawasaki Todoroki Stadium. The final score is 3-1.
Jesiel is on target to give Kawasaki a 2-1 advantage.
Thiago Martins (Yokohama Marinos) gets a yellow card.
It's now 3-1 in Kawasaki as Yu Kobayashi scores for Kawasaki.
